function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of health insurance coverage and limited access to healthcare facilities may result in undetected and uncontrolled contagious diseases within the population.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of resilience-related research across different years may indicate gaps in understanding the evolving nature of contagious disease threats and preparedness.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spillover effects of variables on covid-19 infections and deaths.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Visits to parks by younger individuals in urban areas increases risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Keywords related to death, isolation, and loneliness in the context of covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discrepancies in labeling process","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low compliance","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with nanomaterials and nanotechnology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Subnational governments managing pcas may need specific support from national government.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Comparison of wastewater surveillance data with clinical data","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through physical contact during the survey data collection process.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in political focus from short-term gains to long-term resilience measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of critical thinking and verification of online information leading to sharing of misinformation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited operative","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of education, information, and awareness integration into educational curricula may hinder adoption of ce principles and lifecycle systems thinking","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Isolation and limited mobility of older people living alone creating greater risks.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of humanoid service robots in retail environments may lead to increased physical interactions and close contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on artificial systems for lighting and ventilation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparent communication about virus conditions and threats","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity and group physical activity due to social distancing measures.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of human movement in crowd models may lead to underestimation of disease transmission","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption in the travel and tourism industry","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of nitrogen dioxide no2 emissions due to industrial and vehicular operations coming to a halt during the pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient green areas in urban zones","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure of measures due to lack of consideration for risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Checkpoint allocation for monitory and recording opportunities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases in office spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative consequences of lockdown policies on crowded residential areas and multi-generational families","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for surface contamination on the track flooring leading to the spread of infections","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relatively low standard errors for the calculated air change rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Interpreting vague instructions leading to different interpretations of the task","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Real-time visualization of air contamination may lead to heightened awareness but could cause undue anxiety among building occupants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need to re-imagine water systems and infrastructure to address climate change and potential outbreaks","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in influent samples from multiple wastewater treatment
